mapper.insert: insert into tbl_users (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_img, user_phone, user_addr) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userImg}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr})
mapper.select: select department_name, count(*) cnt from hr.employees e join hr.departments d on e.department_id = d.department_id group by department_name
